DO NOT RECOMMEND! 
Too many basement dwellers with soul-leeching personalities play to make others feel bad, for their own enjoyment because it's a sick a twisted exploitable game.

I have played hours of this game, with friends this game can be fun, but the lack luster part is the game is the game design & the developers decisions. A lot of exploitative behaviour is used and manipulated by players to ruin the experience for others & BHVR does nothing about it. They also have nothing to show for trying to curve the constantly abusive community, homophobia, death-threats, 

2 in 10 games - are very fun. 
2 in 10 games - usually these have a large skill gap and someone is usually having a bad time.
6 in 10 games - these are the real toxic players, the ones who go out of their way to make you have a horrible time & go out of their way to make it happen.
Camping, tunneling, slugging, 'META Perks'... 
People in this game could tell you to die - and the game developers will do NOTHING. 
Horrible, horrible, horrible community. Only fun with friends, or in private matches. I've held out hope for a positive change to this game for a year or two now, and nothing - it's all skins, and just money revenue without a care if the average player has an enjoyable experience.

The game is toxic as fuck. Don't even think about playing this casually from time to time, if you dont play this game all time and know every map by heart, every good loop spot, you won't be able to compete. Also the matchmaking is often bad.

If you asked me a couple years ago, I'd recommend this game instantly, however, I just can't do that anymore. I've played this countless hours on PS4/PS5 back a while ago which is why my Steam Hours won't reflect my playtime very well.

It is okay to play with friends but if you are playing survivor be prepared to have a hell of a time. The game is very Killer favoured for the killer to win, and with so many abilities the killer can combo these days it makes Super OP Killer builds very common. If its not the unbalanced Killer-Survival issues, the Game lobbies take way too long to join a game. Sitting for 10 minutes to wait and play a game gets boring real fast, and to top it off getting thrown into a match to die in a matter of seconds because of these crazy killer builds just makes the wait not worth it.

The ranking is also very off, being paired with top tier players killers when the survivors you play with are just starting doesn't make sense. This game went to super competitive and casual game play is just not an option, not to mention how awful and toxic the player base is.

If you get this on sale, then sure, play a few games with friends, But IMO i would leave this one alone for now and choose to play a different game.
Pay to win hellhole for a game with a $20 asking price. I'm only playing custom games with friends from now on.
